title: Test failure pulling single arch alpine image on opposite arch
body:
### What happened?

Tests are failing trying to pull `docker.io/{ARCH}/alpine` when running on machines opposite of `{ARCH}` (Full test failure below). What I mean is this fails to pull `amd64` when running on `arm64` and fails to pull `arm64v8` when running on `amd64`. 

As far as I can tell this isn't directly related to a goreleaser change because it fails on commits that previously passed. Everything else in the test environment seems consistent as far as I can tell too.

Any ideas?
